Column.Name: Caption
Column.Expression: IsNullOrEmpty( SingleProperty("dprnamespace","description",Format("UID_DPRNameSpace in(select UID_DPRNameSpace from unsroot where uid_unsroot = '{0}')", select top 1 uid_unsroot from TSBVUNSRoot where NamespaceIdentifier in(from NameSpace select current NamespaceIdentifier))), select top 1 NamespaceIdentifier from TSBVUNSRoot where NamespaceIdentifier in(from NameSpace select current NamespaceIdentifier) )

Update.Value: SqlInWithFormat("UID_UNSRoot","String","NonUnicodeLiterals",select uid_unsroot from TSBVUNSRoot where NamespaceIdentifier in(from NameSpace select current NamespaceIdentifier))

IsNullOrEmpty( SingleProperty("dprnamespace","description",Format("UID_DPRNameSpace in(select UID_DPRNameSpace from unsroot where uid_unsroot = '{0}')", select top 1 uid_unsroot from TSBVUNSRoot where NamespaceIdentifier in(from NameSpace select current NamespaceIdentifier))), select top 1 NamespaceIdentifier from TSBVUNSRoot where NamespaceIdentifier in(from NameSpace select current NamespaceIdentifier) )

VirtualFunctionMapping.Value: select top 1 GetObjectKeyTable(xobjectkey) from TSBVUNSRoot where NamespaceIdentifier in(from NameSpace select current NamespaceIdentifier)

Update.Value:
--Responsibilities > Auditing > SAP if(from Vars select NamespaceIdentifier = "SAP") then "F3B52713-34A2-4422-9BC4-4DCF8A802900"
--Responsibilities > Auditing > Active Directory else if(from Vars select NamespaceIdentifier = "ADS") then "F3B52713-34A2-4422-9BC4-4DCF8A802900"
--Responsibilities > Auditing > Privileged Account Management else if(from Vars select NamespaceIdentifier = "PAG") then "F3B52713-34A2-4422-9BC4-4DCF8A802900"
--Responsibilities > Auditing > G Suite else if(from Vars select NamespaceIdentifier = "GoogleApps") then "F3B52713-34A2-4422-9BC4-4DCF8A802900"
--Responsibilities > Auditing > LDAP else if(from Vars select NamespaceIdentifier = "LDAP") then "F3B52713-34A2-4422-9BC4-4DCF8A802900"
--Responsibilities > Auditing > IBM Notes else if(from Vars select NamespaceIdentifier = "NDO") then "F3B52713-34A2-4422-9BC4-4DCF8A802900"
--Responsibilities > Auditing > Azure Active Directory else if(from Vars select NamespaceIdentifier = "AzureAD") then "F3B52713-34A2-4422-9BC4-4DCF8A802900"
--Responsibilities > Auditing > Unix else if(from Vars select NamespaceIdentifier = "Unix") then "F3B52713-34A2-4422-9BC4-4DCF8A802900"
--Responsibilities > Auditing > CustomTargetSystemType else if(from Vars select NamespaceIdentifier = "CustomTargetSystemType") then "F3B52713-34A2-4422-9BC4-4DCF8A802900"
